titles.title: How Great Is Our God (How Great is His Name)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How great is our God How great is His name He’s the greatest one Forever the same.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He rolled back the waters The mighty red sea And He said , “I’ll go with you Put your trust in Me.”{/lang-eng}
